--- 行为树黑板
---@class BlackBoard_BattleBase:BlackBoard
local BlackBoard_BattleBase = SimpleClassUtil:class(BlackBoard)

function BlackBoard_BattleBase:initialize(contextManager)
    self.super:initialize()
    self._heroId = "hero101"
    self._campType = Enum_Battle.Camp.CampEnemy
    self._index_pos = 1
    ---@type Vector3
    self._position = Vector3.zero --BattleUtils:posMapToVec3(BattleUtils:getPositionByIndex(self._campType == Enum_Battle.Camp.CampSelf,self._index_pos))

    self._alive = true
    self._anger = 0
    self._isUnPutSkill = false
    -- 小技能进行中
    self._smallSkillIng = false
    -- 大招是否可以释放
    self._bigSkillReady = false
    -- 大招释放按钮是否按下
    self._isKeyDownBigSkill = false
    -- 是否能被 选定为目标
    self._isCanBeSelected = true
end

return BlackBoard_BattleBase
